title: Qatar's 10-year residency dream: A new golden opportunity for entrepreneurs and CEOs
summary_full: Qatar unveils a 10-year residency program for global founders, investors, and executives, moving beyond traditional sponsorship. This initiative, part of the "Mustaqel" framework, aims to attract significant economic contributors.  Eligible individuals can self-sponsor, bring families, and own property, fostering long-term commitment and innovation within the nation's growing business ecosystem.
